summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented: the React appâ€™s public domain helpers default to `growithtutor.com` in production and the standalone landing page sets `STANDALONE_PUBLIC_DOMAIN` to `growithtutor.com`. The diff does not show edits to the listed immutable paths. Some extra functionality (UTM/link handling, logo URL injection, project state tracking) was added that is not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Standalone landing page adds runtime DOM manipulation to inject logo URLs and modify the caffeine.ai link with UTM parameters (beyond simply setting the domain constant and ensuring helper-built asset URLs resolve correctly).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 only asks to set `STANDALONE_PUBLIC_DOMAIN` and ensure helper-constructed asset URLs resolve to `https://growithtutor.com/...`; additional behaviors (logo injection, UTM rewriting) are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a project tracking/state file with new feature request entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) and status metadata.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention maintaining or changing `project_state.json`; this is extra scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded centralized public-domain configuration module including environment-variable override behavior and extra exported constants (`PUBLIC_URL`).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 requires configuring public-domain-based URL generation and `PUBLIC_DOMAIN` defaulting to `growithtutor.com` for production; extra exports/behaviors (e.g., `PUBLIC_URL`) are not explicitly requested.
